GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
drm/amdgpu: Fix PCI device refcount leak in amdgpu_atrm_get_bios()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 7c1ddf7c664b5bc91f14b1bdeaa45520ef1760e4, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit d38ceaf99ed015f2a0b9af3499791bd3a3daae21. For more details please see the references link.
